tool_description:
Gives you basic data to a stock using the ISIN (more commonly used in the european sector).
Contains 3,688 stocks from EU, US, Japan etc.

Enter a given ISIN for a stock and you will receive the following details:
- Company Name
- Country
- Description (limited to ~400 characters)
- Website for Investor Relations
- Industry
- Industry Sector
- Quantity of floating stocks
- Dividend payings (~Mid 2022)

Contains stocks from the following jurisdictions:
AN, AT, BE, BMG, CA, CH, CNE, DE, DK, ES,...
name: ISIN Stock Basic Data
title: ISIN Stock Basic Data
